title: Runner-up at World Cup tournaments by country 1930 to 2014
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of runners-up for 10 number of Countrys.
The Number of runners-up is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country France.
The minimum Country France has got 4.0 times less Number of runners-up than the maximum Country Germany.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of runners-up for 10 number of Countrys.
The maximum Number of runners-up 4.0 is found at Country Germany and the minimum is found at France where Country is 1.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of runners-up for 10 number of Countrys.
The Number of runners-up is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country France.
The minimum Country France has got 4.0 times less Number of runners-up than the maximum Country Germany.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of runners-up in each Country on the y axis.
The Number of runners-up is highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country France.
The difference of Number of runners-up between the highest and lowest Country is 3.0.
Number of runners-up at Country Germany is 4.0 , second place is Argentina at 3.0, and thirdly is Argentina at 3.0.
Country Czech Republic, Brazil, Czechoslovakia, Italy, and Hungary have a similar Number of runners-up that is 2.0.
The highest value 4.0 at Germany is almost 1.82 times larger than the average value 2.2.
